meaning: phrase, clause, sentence, passage, paragraph, counter for haiku

onyomiExamples.meaning: section (i.e. of text), sentence, passage, paragraph, phrase, verse (of 5 or 7 mora in Japanese poetry; of 4, 5, or 7 characters in Chinese poetry), haiku, first 17 morae of a renga, etc., maxim, saying, idiom, expression
punctuation, pause, juncture, end, (place to) stop
being lost for words, becoming speechless, jueju (Chinese quatrain with lines of either five or seven syllables)
